Title: Relates to requiring employees who provide respite care services to be certified in first aid and CPR/AED
Summary: Requires employees who provide respite care services to be certified in first aid and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR)/automated external defibrillator use (AED).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring employees who provide respite care services to be certified in first aid and CPR/AED
